attributes.action: Charge radicals going to fight in Syria and Iraq with High Treason.
attributes.additional_details:
Every day we hear of many young British People going to fight in Iraq, Syria and Afghanistan for Islamic terrorist groups many of which the British Army is fighting against every single day. After the war is over many of the fighters expect to return to the United Kingdom and carry on lives as normal.

Enough is enough its time to charge these people with High Treason because in reality that's what they are doing.

rejection.details: This would be an operational police matter and not for HM Government.
